title: HSN | Melissa McCarthy Seven7: The List Special Edition 06.08.2017 - 10 PM
description: Shop beautiful must have fashions from award winning actress, writer, and designer Melissa McCarthy. Developed for every woman, these garments combine her artistic design and her personal experience and feature a variety of modern styling solutions. Prices shown on the previously recorded video may not represent the current price.
